analysis.key_quote: I oppose the Proposed Rule in its entirety. As explained below, it is inconsistent with the Civil Service Reform Act of 1978 (CSRA), Pub. L. 95-454, codified as amended in scattered sections of Title 5 of the U.S. Code.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, citing concerns about its constitutionality, its inconsistency with existing civil service protections, and the potential for increased politicization of the civil service. These points align with the themes of merit-based system concerns and due process rights.
